Documentation.UserDocu: This object allows the computation of wind spectrum using the von Karman spectrum

double computeAlongWindAutoSpectrum(frequency, meanSpeed, integralLengthScale, standardDeviation, Par1, Par2); frequency = the frequency value for which the spectrum will be calculated meanSpeed = the mean wind speed integralLengthScale = the integral length scale standardDeviation = the standard deviation Part1, Part2 = some constants.

double computeAcrossWindAutoSpectrum(frequency, meanSpeed, integralLengthScale, standardDeviation, Par1, Par2); frequency = the frequency value for which the spectrum will be calculated meanSpeed = the mean wind speed integralLengthScale = the integral length scale standardDeviation = the standard deviation Part1, Part2 = some constants.

double computeVerticalWindAutoSpectrum(frequency, meanSpeed, integralLengthScale, standardDeviation, Par1, Par2, Part3); frequency = the frequency value for which the spectrum will be calculated meanSpeed = the mean wind speed integralLengthScale = the integral length scale standardDeviation = the standard deviation Part1, Part2, Part3 = some constants.
